inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description:
A flag determining whether the panel is disabled or not.
When disabled, the panel cannot be toggled.

inputs.name: id
inputs.description:
An optional id for the panel. The id should be unique.
If not provided, it will be auto-generated.

inputs.name: open
inputs.description: Defines whether the panel should be open initially.

inputs.name: title
inputs.description: The title for the panel.

inputs.name: closeOthers
inputs.description:
A flag determining whether the other panels should be closed
when a panel is opened.

NgbxAlert.description: Alerts can be used to provide feedback messages.

inputs.name: dismissible
inputs.description:
A flag indicating if a given alert can be dismissed (closed) by a user. If this flag is set, a close button (in a
form of a cross) will be displayed.

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Alert type (CSS class). Bootstrap 4 recognizes the following types: "success", "info", "warning" and "danger".

outputs.name: close
outputs.description: An event emitted when the close button is clicked. This event has no payload. Only relevant for dismissible alerts.

NgbxRadioGroup.description:
Easily create Bootstrap-style radio buttons. A value of a selected button is bound to a variable
specified via ngModel.

NgbxRadio.description: Marks an input of type "radio" as part of the NgbxRadioGroup.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: You can specify model value of a given radio by binding to the value property.

NgbxCollapse.description: The NgbxCollapse directive provides a simple way to hide and show an element with animations.

inputs.name: ngbxCollapse
inputs.description: A flag indicating collapsed (true) or open (false) state.

NgbxDropdown.description: Transforms a node into a dropdown.

inputs.name: autoClose
inputs.description: Indicates that dropdown should be closed when selecting one of dropdown items (click) or pressing ESC.

inputs.name: open
inputs.description: Defines whether or not the dropdown-menu is open initially.

outputs.name: openChange
outputs.description:
An event fired when the dropdown is opened or closed.
Event's payload equals whether dropdown is open.

NgbxDropdownToggle.description: Allows the dropdown to be toggled via click. This directive is optional.

inputs.name: alignLinks
inputs.description: A flag for determining whether links need to be aligned.

inputs.name: noOfPages
inputs.description: Number of pages present.

inputs.name: page
inputs.description: Current page.

outputs.name: pageChange
outputs.description:
An event fired when the page is changed.
Event's payload equals the current page.

inputs.name: boundaryLinks
inputs.description: Whether to show the "First" and "Last" page links

inputs.name: collectionSize
inputs.description: Number of items in collection.

inputs.name: page
inputs.description: Current page.

inputs.name: pageSize
inputs.description: Number of items per page.

outputs.name: pageChange
outputs.description:
An event fired when the page is changed.
Event's payload equals the current page.

NgbxProgressbar.description: Directive that can be used to provide feedback on the progress of a workflow or an action.

inputs.name: animated
inputs.description:
A flag indicating if a progress bar should be animated when the value changes. Takes effect only for browsers
supporting CSS3 animations.

inputs.name: max
inputs.description: Maximal value to be displayed in the progressbar.

inputs.name: striped
inputs.description: A flag indicating if a progress bar should be displayed as striped.

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Type of progress bar, can be one of "success", "info", "warning" or "danger".

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: Current value to be displayed in the progressbar. Should be smaller or equal to "max" value.

NgbxTab.description: A directive representing an individual tab.

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description: Allows toggling disabled state of a given state. Disabled tabs can't be selected.

inputs.name: id
inputs.description: Unique tab identifier. Must be unique for the entire document for proper accessibility support.

inputs.name: title
inputs.description: Simple (string only) title. Use the "NgbxTabTitle" directive for more complex use-cases.

NgbxTabset.description: A component that makes it easy to create tabbed interface.

inputs.name: activeId
inputs.description: An identifier of a tab that should be selected (active).

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Type of navigation to be used for tabs. Can be one of 'tabs' or 'pills'.
